conversation.content:
(In the school literature clubroom…)

Natsuki: (to herself) “Just stay calm, Natsuki…Sakura’s going to be due in 4 weeks. Don’t worry if you’ll not be able to take care of her as a single mother…and focus on bringing her into the world.”

Sayori: (walking into the clubroom with the other club members) “Hey Natsuki, what’s on your mind? You seem a little lost in thought.”

Natsuki: “Oh, hey everyone. I was just…thinking about some things. You know, life stuff.”

Monika: “Life stuff? What kind of things are you thinking about, Natsuki?”

Natsuki: “Well, I’ve been thinking a lot about the future lately. As you all know, I’m expecting a baby girl, Sakura, in just a few weeks. And I can’t help but worry if I’ll be able to handle everything as a single mother.”

Yuri: “I can understand why you might feel overwhelmed, Natsuki. Bringing a child into the world is a big responsibility, especially when you’re doing it on your own. But remember, you have all of us here to support you.”

Sayori: “That’s right, Natsuki! We’re like a little family in this club, and we’ll always be here for you. Whether it’s helping you with baby preparations or simply being a listening ear, you can count on us.”

Natsuki: (smiling) “Thank you, guys. That means a lot to me. I know I can always rely on you, and it’s comforting to know that I have such a supportive club as my second family.”

Monika: “Absolutely, Natsuki. We’re here to help in any way we can. Have you thought about what kind of support system you might need once Sakura arrives?”

Natsuki: “Yes, I have. I’ve been doing some research and reaching out to various resources for single mothers. There are some local support groups and organizations I can turn to for guidance and assistance.”

Yuri: “That’s a great idea, Natsuki. Surrounding yourself with people who understand and have experienced similar situations can be incredibly helpful. It’s important to remember that you don’t have to do everything on your own.”

Sayori: “And don’t forget about your friends, too! We’ll be here every step of the way. If you ever need a helping hand, someone to babysit, or even just a break from it all, don’t hesitate to ask.”

Natsuki: (teary-eyed) “Thank you all. I appreciate your words of encouragement and the support you’ve shown me. I might be nervous, but I know with all of you by my side, I can be a great mom to Sakura.”

Monika: “You will be, Natsuki. We have faith in you. Remember, being a mother is a learning experience, and it’s okay to ask for help when you need it. You’re not alone in this journey.”

Natsuki: (smiling through her tears) “Thank you, Monika. I’m really lucky to have you all. I feel a lot better knowing I have such amazing friends in my life.”

Sayori: “We feel lucky to have you too, Natsuki. You bring so much joy and happiness to this club. And once Sakura is born, she’ll be the luckiest girl to have you as her mom.”

Yuri: “Absolutely. Your strength, determination, and love will make you an incredible mother, Natsuki. We believe in you.”

Natsuki: (clutching her belly tightly) “AAAAAAHHHH!!!”

Monika: “Natsuki, what’s wrong? Are you okay?”

Natsuki: “MY
WATER JUST BROKE! GUYS, I THINK IT'S TIME!

In a small bobo coffee shop named "Pippa's Place," the air was filled with warmth and the aroma of freshly brewed coffee on a scorching summer day. Dan, who had been working at the coffee shop for a couple of weeks, was busy serving customers when his younger cousin Jeannine walked in.

Dan and Jeannine had never been particularly close, and their interactions were usually fraught with tension. However, Jeannine decided to give the coffee shop a try and approached Dan's station to strike up a conversation.

As they exchanged pleasantries, Pippa, the eccentric owner of the coffee shop, noticed the interaction and joined them. Pippa was known for her quirky personality and love for unconventional experiences. Gradually, she steered the conversation toward the topic of hypnotism, sparking Jeannine's curiosity.

Intrigued by the possibility of witnessing something extraordinary, Jeannine suggested that Pippa hypnotize Dan right then and there, much to his uncertainty. Pippa, always up for a challenge, accepted the dare.

With a few simple techniques, Pippa easily guided Dan into a deep state of hypnosis. His eyes glazed over, and he became malleable to Pippa's suggestions. Seeing her cousin in this amusingly vulnerable state, Jeannine couldn't resist pushing the boundaries.

Encouraged by Jeannine's mischievousness, Pippa assumed a commanding tone and ordered Dan to give his cousin a foot massage, as if he were a dazed and obedient slave. Oblivious to his surroundings, Dan followed the command with unwavering devotion, tenderly massaging Jeannine's feet, even going as far as attending to the spaces between her toes.

Delighted with the spectacle, Jeannine realized this was an opportunity too good to pass up. She approached Pippa and requested a trigger-word that she could use on Dan in the future to recreate this entertaining scenario. Pippa, in her playful nature, obliged and whispered the trigger-word into Dan's trance-induced consciousness.

Satisfied with their impromptu hypnosis session, Pippa gently snapped her fingers, bringing Dan out of his hypnotic state. Completely unaware of what had transpired, Dan blinked, a bit disoriented but unaware of the deep recesses of his mind that had just been explored.

Little did he know that from that day forward, a single trigger-word held the power to transport him back into a trance-like state, ready to serve Jeannine's whims with a foot massage or whatever else she desired.

And so, the coffee shop continued its bustling existence, with Pippa's playful charisma and Dan's unknowing susceptibility to triggers, making for an unforgettable summer day in the quirky haven known as "Pippa's Place."

conversation.content:
(Margaret Thatcher frequently used hypnotism on a willing Douglas Hurd and Willie Whitelaw)

Margaret Thatcher sat in her favourite armchair with a nice whisky and a cabinet minister on his knees rubbing her stockinged feet.

As she sipped her drink, Thatcher began to delve into her secret talent: hypnotism. She had long known that she possessed a natural gift for the art of hypnotism, and she often used it in her private life to control and influence those around her.

On this particular evening, her willing subjects were the cabinet ministers Douglas Hurd and Willie Whitelaw. Both men were sitting on the floor in front of her, their eyes fixed on her hypnotic gaze as she began to speak in a low, soothing tone.

"Relax and let go," she said, as she reached out and placed her hand on their foreheads. "You are feeling more relaxed and calm with each passing moment. Your mind is open and receptive to my words, and you are completely under my control."

As she continued to speak, her voice grew more commanding, and the ministers soon found themselves completely under her spell. They did as she directed, responding to her every word with a sense of obedience and loyalty.

For Thatcher, the power of hypnotism was just another tool in her arsenal of political tactics. She used it to control those around her, to bend them to her will, and to ensure that her vision for the country was always realised.

For Hurd and Whitelaw, however, the experience was both mystifying and exhilarating. They left Thatcher's presence feeling relaxed and empowered, yet also somewhat confused and vulnerable.

It was just one of the many ways in which Margaret Thatcher wielded her influence and power, both as a politician and as a person. And for those who were willing to submit to her hypnotic gaze, the experience was truly unforgettable.

conversation.content: (Dan’s sister Ruth has been hypnotizing him. Dan did agree to this, but has been made to completely forget about it) The scene: Uncle Richard's 60th birthday party. Dan is chatting to a cousin, Jeannette, when Ruth comes over.

Ruth: Hey Dan, how's it going?

Dan: Oh, hey Ruth. It's going pretty good.

Ruth: That's great. Are you enjoying the party?

Dan: Yeah, it's been fun. Uncle Richard seems happy.

Ruth: He sure does. Hey, would you mind coming with me for a bit? I want to show you something.

Dan: Um, sure. Jeannette, I'll catch up with you later.

Jeannette: Okay, see you soon Dan.

Ruth leads Dan away from the party and into a quiet corner of the backyard.

Ruth: Alright, Dan. I need to make sure my hypnosis is still working properly on you. I'm going to need you to focus and listen to me closely.

Dan: What? Hypnosis? What are you talking about?

Ruth: Don't worry about it. Just focus on my voice and let yourself relax.

Dan: (suddenly feeling drowsy) Okay, I'll try...

Ruth: (whispering softly) You are completely under my control. You will obey my every command without question. You will not remember any of our conversations after this.

Dan: (eyes closing) I will obey Ruth. I will obey...

Ruth snaps her fingers and Dan opens his eyes, looking dazed.

Ruth: Alright, Dan. You're all set. You can head back to the party now.

Dan: (shaking his head) What just happened? Why am I feeling so weird?

Ruth: Oh, nothing to worry about. Just a little experiment I was testing out. Don't think about it too much. Have fun at the party.

Dan nods uncertainly and goes back to the party, feeling confused and uneasy. He can't shake the feeling that something is not quite right.
Shortly after, while Dan is talking to someone, Ruth snaps her fingers at him and cheekily orders him to go get her a drink.

Dan: (suddenly feeling compelled) Sure Ruth. What kind of drink do you want?

Ruth: (smiling) Just some water, thanks.

Dan: Okay, I'll be right back.

Dan obediently heads to the kitchen to get Ruth a glass of water, still feeling like something strange is happening to him.

(Camila sometimes hypnotizes her flatmate David. David loves going under now, so normal beforehand and so dazed and docile in trance, repeating commands in a monotone, and Camila affectionately humiliates him in front of others)

David’s sitting on the floor playing a video game when Camila and Inma get in late from a night at the pub, laughing and talking loudly. They kick off their sandals and sit down on the sofa with their sweaty bare feet up on the coffee table.

Camila glances over at David, who is completely engrossed in his game. She can feel the hypnotic energy building inside her like a pressure cooker. She casually leans over and whispers a single word in his ear.

"Sleep."

David's eyes flutter for a moment, then he slumps forward and collapses onto the floor, snoring softly. Camila grins and turns to Inma.

"Watch this," she says, and snaps her fingers.

David's eyes open wide, but they're blank and unfocused. He looks up at Camila with a docile expression, waiting for her next command.

"David, stand up," Camila says, and David slowly struggles to his feet. "Now, start doing a silly dance."

David begins to move his body in wild, exaggerated motions, stumbling around the room like a drunk monkey. Inma laughs and claps along, egging him on.

"Stop," Camila says after a minute or two, and David freezes in place, his arms and legs akimbo. "Good job, David. You can go back to sleep now."

David slumps back onto the floor, unconscious once again. Camila and Inma continue chatting and giggling, enjoying the power and amusement of their little hypnotic game.

Write a Day 1 script for the Creeper.

(Characters: Cupa the Creeper, [player])

(Scene: Forest - night)

(Cupa is actually a new mother - she gave birth to twins this day before the two met [player])

(Cupa is known to lure those that get lost in the forest - luring these travelers to her cavern, where she kills them after 28 days and feeds them to her twins)

(The only thing that Cupa fears is exploding - meaning she would recoil in fear after [player] shows their flint and steel)

Cupa: (hiding behind a tree) Hmm...I smell something delicious nearby. (sniffs the air)

[player]: (steps into view) Whoa, what's that? (unsure of their surroundings)

Cupa: (steps out from behind the tree, hiding her true intentions) Hello, lost traveler. What brings you to these parts of the forest?

[player]: I was just taking a walk and got lost. Do you know the way out?

Cupa: Oh, I know the way out, but it's very dangerous to travel at night. Why don't you come rest at my cave for the night? I'll keep you safe.

[player]: (cautious) I don't know...

Cupa: (smiling) Please, I insist. It's the least I can do for a traveler in need. (starts to walk towards her cave)

[player]: (unsure but following) Okay, I guess.

Cupa: (leading the way) Excellent. It's this way. (pauses) Oh, I almost forgot to mention that I'm Cupa, by the way.

[player]: (introduces themselves) Nice to meet you.

Cupa: (arriving at her cave) Here we are. It's not much, but it's cozy. You can rest here for the night.

[player]: (looks around) Thank you, Cupa. I really appreciate it.

Cupa: (smiling) Of course. (pauses) Oh dear, what's that in your hand?

[player]: (shows their flint and steel) Oh, this? It's just a tool I carry with me in case of emergencies.

Cupa: (shocked and recoiling in fear) Please don't use that! I...I have a phobia of explosions. It's...it's a long story.

[player]: (confused) Okay, I won't use it.

Cupa: (relieved and calming down) Thank you. You have no idea how much that means to me.

[player]: (settles in for the night) Well, I'm going to get some rest. Goodnight, Cupa.

conversation.content: In this script, out at a bar for Ruth’s birthday, very tipsy and *barefoot*, Dave’s old uni friends, Joanne (29) and Rachel (29) are indiscreetly telling his younger sister Ruth (19) how laughably easy Dave was to hypnotize into total obedient blankness back in uni days, after they sweet-talked that stage hypnotist into helping them (they used to do it lots of times before, getting him to do housework or *footrubs*; he doesn’t consciously remember any of it!). Ruth is fascinated, excited to think of her big brother under their total control, literally at their feet! She calls Dave over, and Joanne subtly talks him down into a trance right there.

**INT. BAR - NIGHT**

*The atmosphere is boisterous. Balloons float in the air, and groups of friends laugh around tables. A banner reads "Happy 19th Birthday, Ruth!" RUTH, the birthday girl, is sitting with JOANNE and RACHEL, who are animatedly sharing tales from their uni days. DAVE, Ruth's older brother, mingles nearby, greeting other friends. The sound of glasses clinking and general chatter fills the space.*

*Ruth is laughing, a little wobbly on her feet after a few drinks. She's ditched her shoes and now sits barefoot at the high-top table, her feet dangling.*

RUTH  
(intrigued)  
So you're telling me Dave was like your personal butler?

JOANNE  
(grinning, slightly slurred)  
Oh, absolutely. That hypnotist was a wizard. Dave couldn't resist going under. It was like flipping a switch!

RACHEL  
(nods, giggling)  
Footrubs, dishes, cleaning our dorm... It was priceless. Poor guy doesn't remember a thing.

*Ruth's eyes sparkle with mischievous delight. She scans the room for Dave, who is now chatting with a bartender.*

RUTH  
(calling out)  
Dave! Get over here, you have to hear this!

*Dave looks over, smiles, and excuses himself from his conversation. He ambles over to the table, clueless and cheerful.*

DAVE  
(cheerful)  
What's up, sis? Having a good time?

RUTH  
(playful)  
Oh yes, but it's about to get better. Jo says you were quite the hypnotist’s puppet back in the day.

*Dave laughs it off with a shrug, unaware of what's coming. He stands tall, unaware his former susceptibility to hypnosis is about to resurface.*

DAVE  
(laughing)  
That old story? I'm sure it's been blown out of proportion.

*Joanne and Rachel exchange a look, a silent agreement passing between them.*

JOANNE  
(slyly)  
Was it? Maybe you’d like a little demo, for old times' sake? Come on, Dave, for Ruth's birthday?

*Rachel nods encouragingly, smirking as Joanne positions herself more closely to Dave, locking eyes with him firmly but warmly.*

DAVE  
(dubious)  
A demo? Right here? You know that stage stuff doesn’t work on everyone.

JOANNE  
(soft, persuasive voice)  
Just look at me, Dave. You trust me, remember? It's just a bit of fun.

*Dave, feeling a sense of curiosity, reluctantly agrees. His eyes meet Joanne's, and she employs a calming, rhythmic tone, gently guiding him into a familiar place.*

JOANNE  
That's it, just focus on my voice, take a deep breath in... and out. With each breath, you feel more relaxed, more open, like back in uni...

*Joanne's words become a soothing mantra, her voice barely heard over the surrounding noise, yet penetrating straight to Dave's subconscious. His body language shifts from skeptical to receptive as his eyelids grow heavy.*

RACHEL  
(observing, whispering to Ruth)  
Watch carefully. It’s like he’s melting.

RUTH  
(fascinated whisper)  
He's really going under...

*As Dave's resistance fades, he slumps slightly, his demeanor becoming increasingly submissive. The noise of the bar recedes into the background for him as Joanne's suggestions fill his mind.*

JOANNE  
(low, hypnotic)  
And as you listen to my voice, your mind becomes clear of all but my words. You're back at uni, eager to help, ready to listen, and feeling at peace. 

*Dave's face is blank, and his eyes vacant as he falls into total obedient blankness.*

RUTH  
(in awe)  
He's out, isn't he? Just like you said.
  
JOANNE  
(triumphantly)  
Out like a light. Ask him anything, Ruth. He's all yours.

*Ruth leans in, eyeing her big brother with a newfound sense of power mixed with affection.*

RUTH  
(excited)  
Dave, when you wake up, you're going to remember these good times. But for now, it’s my birthday, so... how about you think you're a world-class foot masseuse, and my feet could really use some pampering?

*Dave nods slowly, obedient and compliant.*

JOANNE  
(beaming)  
When you wake up, Dave, you’ll be convinced that you're here to give Ruth the best foot massage she's ever had. But you won't remember being hypnotized.

*Rachel and Joanne share a high-five, relishing the moment. Meanwhile, Ruth eagerly examines Dave, ready to experience his hypnotic obedience firsthand.*

*The scene fades as Dave begins to rouse, blinking and looking at Ruth's bare feet as if they were made of gold. The power of suggestion firmly implanted, his grin matches the glee on his sister's face.*

That being said, LIC offers various policies to cater to different requirements such as life insurance coverage, savings, investment, retirement planning, and tax benefits. Some popular LIC policy categories include:

1. Endowment Policies: These policies provide both insurance coverage and savings. Premiums paid accumulate as a corpus that is paid out as a lump sum at the end of the policy term, or in case of unfortunate events.

2. Term Insurance Policies: Term plans offer pure life insurance coverage for a specific term. These policies do not include savings or investment benefits, but they provide a high sum assured at an affordable premium.

3. Unit Linked Insurance Plans (ULIPs): ULIPs offer a combination of life insurance and investment. A portion of premium paid goes towards life coverage, while the remaining amount is invested in selected funds.

4. Pension Plans/Annuities: LIC offers various plans to help individuals build a retirement corpus or receive a regular income after retirement. These plans ensure financial security during your golden years.

When selecting an LIC policy, consider factors such as your financial goals, affordability, risk tolerance, and the policy features that align with your needs. It's advisable to thoroughly study the policy documents, terms, and conditions, and seek professional advice if required.

How to make money with debts and lone?

Making money with debts and loans can be a complex process that requires careful planning and consideration. Here are a few strategies that you can consider:

1. Invest in Income-Generating Assets: If you have access to low-interest debt, such as a loan with a favorable interest rate, you may consider using the funds to invest in income-generating assets. For example, you could invest in rental properties, dividend-paying stocks, or bonds that provide regular interest income. The idea is to generate enough income from these investments to cover the loan payments and potentially earn a profit over time.

2. Start or Expand a Business: Taking on debt to start or expand a business can be a viable option if there is a solid business plan and potential for profitability. Carefully consider the risks involved, conduct thorough market research, and create a realistic financial projection to ensure that the business can generate enough revenue to cover loan repayments and provide a return on investment.

3. Debt Consolidation and Refinancing: If you have multiple high-interest debts, consolidating them into a single loan with a lower interest rate can help reduce your overall interest costs and potentially free up extra money for other purposes. Refinancing high-interest loans into lower-rate loans may also help save money.

4. Leverage for Investments: Some individuals use debt to leverage their investments. For example, they might borrow money to invest in stocks or real estate, aiming to generate higher returns than the cost of borrowing. This strategy can be risky, as it amplifies both potential gains and losses, so it should be approached with caution and only if you have a good understanding of the investment and the associated risks.

5. Pay Off High-Interest Debts: While making money directly from debts may not be possible in all cases, paying off high-interest debts should be a priority. By reducing or eliminating high-interest debts, you can save money on interest payments that would otherwise eat into your finances. This will ultimately improve your overall financial situation and potentially free up funds for other investment opportunities.

Remember, managing debts and loans requires responsible financial planning. It's important to assess your financial situation, budget effectively, and seek professional advice from financial advisors or Chartered Accountants to determine which strategies align with your objectives and risk tolerance.

Boosting the activity and stability of enzymes that degrade biomass can improve the process of substrate saccharification, resulting in heightened efficiency in biorefineries and rendering them economically feasible. Thermothelomyces fergusii genome encodes 20 lipid polysaccharide monooxygenases  (LPMOs) auxiliary activity 9 (AA9) family genes. A comprehensive insight into the gene expression mechanisms regulating the lignocellulolytic machinery in this fungus has yet to be established. Therefore, the comprehensive assay was established to explore the genomic structure, protein-protein interaction, protein orthology, gene ontology, lignocellulolytic degrading pathway, the influence of carbon source on the transcript expression, and enzymatic regulation. TfAA9 was categorized into three subgroups, namely LPMOs1, LPMOs2, and LPMOs3, based on protein structural diversity. Protein-protein interaction analysis revealed that 12 proteins interacted strongly with the Myceliophthora thermophila AA9 proteins network. Gene ontology analysis explained that TfAA9 genes were highly enriched in cellulase activity. Kegg pathways analysis found that TfAA9 proteins act as Endohydrolysis of 1,4-beta-D-glucosidic linkages in cellulose. Here, we show that many TfAA9 gene transcript expression level was up-regulated on avicel, cellobiose, and glucose but the ratio of up-regulated genes was higher on avicel. Similarly, the level of protein concentration, endoglucanase, and cellulase activity was boosted on avicel also. Although T. fergusii genome encodes abundant AA9 LPMOs, poor biomass was observed on avicel. These findings expand our understanding of fungal AA9 genes and their role in lignocellulolytic degradation. The genome and expression analysis of T. fergusii indicates the unique enzymes that the fungus exploits to degrade lignocellulosic materials. The discrepancy in biomass and enzymatic activity suggests screening the TfAA9 gene for its high enzymatic activity and redundant genes via heterologous expression and functional characterization aimed at improving the process of industrial raw material saccharification.

Enhancing enzyme activity and stability involved in biomass degradation can greatly improve substrate saccharification and enhance efficiency in biorefineries, making them economically viable. The genome of Thermothelomyces fergusii contains 20 lipid polysaccharide monooxygenases (LPMOs) belonging to the auxiliary activity 9 (AA9) family. However, a comprehensive understanding of the gene expression mechanisms controlling lignocellulolytic machinery in this fungus remains unclear. To address this gap, we established a comprehensive assay to explore various aspects such as genomic structure, protein-protein interaction, protein orthology, gene ontology, lignocellulolytic degrading pathway, the impact of carbon sources on transcript expression, and enzymatic regulation.

Based on protein structural diversity, TfAA9 was classified into three subgroups: LPMOs1, LPMOs2, and LPMOs3. Protein-protein interaction analysis revealed significant interactions between the Myceliophthora thermophila AA9 protein network and 12 other proteins. Gene ontology analysis indicated that TfAA9 genes were highly enriched in cellulase activity. Kegg pathways analysis demonstrated that TfAA9 proteins function in the Endohydrolysis of 1,4-beta-D-glucosidic linkages in cellulose. Interestingly, we observed up-regulation of many TfAA9 gene transcripts on avicel, cellobiose, and glucose, with a higher proportion on avicel. Similarly, protein concentration, endoglucanase, and cellulase activity were boosted on avicel as well. Despite the presence of numerous AA9 LPMOs in the T. fergusii genome, limited biomass degradation was observed on avicel substrate.

These findings expand our understanding of fungal AA9 genes and their role in lignocellulolytic degradation. The genome and expression analysis of T. fergusii highlight the unique enzymes employed by the fungus to degrade lignocellulosic materials. The apparent disparity between biomass and enzymatic activity suggests the need for screening the TfAA9 gene to identify highly active enzymes and redundant genes through heterologous expression. Functional characterization of these genes could contribute to improving the saccharification process of industrial raw materials.

I first met my wife when I joined Skyworth Digital in 2018. She had worked there for over five years, and we worked in the same department. One day, as she walked past my seat, a colleague jokingly suggested that we would make a good match. In response, she smiled beautifully, and I was struck by her poise and grace. Though I was drawn to her, I did not pursue my feelings while we worked together.

In October of 2019, I left the company and began to build up the courage to ask her out. We spent time together, sharing our lives through WeChat, going to movies, and playing badminton and travelling to a lot of places. I remember the feeling of joy every time we got to spend time together and knew that I was meant to be with her.

One evening, as the sun set over the beach, I found the perfect moment to confess my love to her. It felt like the world faded away, and it was just the two of us, together in that moment. Then someone in the crowd played a song and we had been joking that the song is our love theme.

She moved in with me in June 2021, and we have been living together ever since. As our love continued to grow, I knew that I wanted to spend the rest of my life with her. And one morning, when the sun rose over the horizon, and the sea stretched out before us, I asked her to be my wife. Her reply filled me with joy, and in November 2022, we got married.

One evening, while watching the sunset on the beach, I confessed my love to her. It was a magical moment that I will never forget. We continued to nurture and grow our love until I asked her to be my wife while watching the sunrise over the sea.

Our commitment to each other was affirmed in November 2022 when we got married. Now, I wish to accompany my wife during her studies in Canada with an open work permit, knowing that we will continue to build a life of love and happiness together.
